120465.content:
@WallStreetBets#120463 

[HOM_project_2020.pdf](https://www.fer.unizg.hr/_download/repository/HOM_project_2020.pdf) , strana 3, kaže:
> [size=24]**Problem formulation**[/size]

> The problem defines the following constrains:
> 1. Each customer is served by exactly one vehicle/route, with the resource amounts that equal their demands.
